intro: Epidendrum scriptum, commonly known as the script orchid, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its long, pendant inflorescences that bear numerous small, fragrant flowers in shades of white, yellow, and green. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte, attaching itself to trees and other surfaces in its natural habitat.
